divs: sighting detailsi had worked all night at (*name of business deleted--sgonzalez\cms) in ellensburg, washington and had promised to transport my sister and her boyfriend to the university of oregon in eugene the next morning. i was able to drive most of the day but got too tired just east of sisters. we pulled over to camp at a usfs campground and i fell asleep rather early in the evening. i awoke shortly after 2:00 a.m. and turned the radio on in the car for something to do. i was gazing into the sky at roughly 3:00 a.m. when a round, bright white object, similar in size and shape to a full moon emerged from behind the hills to the north and crossed a straight flight path through the western night sky in about 8 seconds. i heard no engine noise but sensed a very slight "whooshing" sound. it disappeared into the southern horizon. i only remember a brief impulse to wake my companions but quickly realized that the object was moving with such speed that my moment would have been lost if i turned away.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sisters
There were no other sightings in Sisters on or around June 28th 1975
Summary: Saw a round, bright white object cross the sky from horizon to horizon.
